item.title: Would You Rather Weigh Less, or Feel Better?
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1332" align="alignright" width="300" caption="PinkSherbertPhotography on Flickr"][/caption]

For many people, the answer to that question is actually that they would rather weigh less. For many women especially, weight is the end-all-be-all of the larger world of health. You can be fit as a fiddle, but if you weight “too much” it doesn’t matter a bit.

item.title: You Are What Your Ancestors Ate
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_962" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Source: alexdecarvalho on Flickr"][/caption]

Meat and veggies, nuts and seeds, some fruit, little starch, and no sugar -The Paleo Diet in a nutshell

Many of my friends know I follow an approximately Paleo diet, and a lot of people argue with me as to why it is silly to eat like Paleolithic humans. I thought I would take the time to dispel some myths and misunderstandings about this 'diet', and hopefully win a few converts.
